alert.note: Alert for Goochland; Hanover; Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 6:55PM EDT until June 16 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Louisa County in central Virginia... Central Goochland County in central Virginia... West central Hanover County in central Virginia... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 654 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mineral, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Gum Spring around 730 PM EDT. Goochland and Oilville around 745 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Orchid, Pendleton, Sandy Hook, Vontay, Maidens, Irwin, Mabelton, Cuckoo, Rockville and Dabneys. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
